Description: High-Availability Web Application Stack with ALB, Auto Scaling, and Multi-AZ deployment

ProjectName.Description: Project name for resource naming and tagging

PublicSubnet1Cidr.Description: CIDR block for public subnet in AZ1

PublicSubnet2Cidr.Description: CIDR block for public subnet in AZ2

PrivateSubnet1Cidr.Description: CIDR block for private subnet in AZ1

PrivateSubnet2Cidr.Description: CIDR block for private subnet in AZ2

SSHAllowedCidr.Description: CIDR block allowed for SSH access to EC2 instances

InstanceType.Description: EC2 instance type for web servers

KeyPairName.Description: EC2 Key Pair for SSH access (leave empty to create a new key pair automatically)
KeyPairName.ConstraintDescription: Key pair name must be alphanumeric with hyphens and underscores only, or empty to create automatically

MinSize.Description: Minimum number of instances in Auto Scaling Group (minimum 2 for high availability)

MaxSize.Description: Maximum number of instances in Auto Scaling Group

DesiredCapacity.Description: Desired number of instances in Auto Scaling Group (minimum 2 for high availability)

S3BucketName.Description: S3 bucket name for application code (must be globally unique)

Properties.GroupDescription: Security group for Application Load Balancer
Security group for web server instances

SecurityGroupIngress.Description: Allow SSH access from specified CIDR

Fn::Base64.Fn::Sub:
#!/bin/bash yum update -y yum install -y httpd systemctl start httpd systemctl enable httpd # Install CloudWatch agent yum install -y amazon-cloudwatch-agent # Create a simple web page cat > /var/www/html/index.html << EOF Secure Web Application

Welcome to the Secure Web Application

Instance ID: $(curl -s http://169.254.169.254/latest/meta-data/instance-id)

Availability Zone: $(curl -s http://169.254.169.254/latest/meta-data/placement/availability-zone)

Stack: ${AWS::StackName}

EOF # Configure CloudWatch agent cat > /opt/aws/amazon-cloudwatch-agent/etc/amazon-cloudwatch-agent.json << EOF { "metrics": { "namespace": "AWS/EC2/Custom", "metrics_collected": { "cpu": { "measurement": ["cpu_usage_idle", "cpu_usage_iowait", "cpu_usage_user", "cpu_usage_system"], "metrics_collection_interval": 60 }, "disk": { "measurement": ["used_percent"], "metrics_collection_interval": 60, "resources": ["*"] }, "mem": { "measurement": ["mem_used_percent"], "metrics_collection_interval": 60 } } } } EOF /opt/aws/amazon-cloudwatch-agent/bin/amazon-cloudwatch-agent-ctl -a fetch-config -m ec2 -c file:/opt/aws/amazon-cloudwatch-agent/etc/amazon-cloudwatch-agent.json -s

Properties.AlarmDescription: Critical: Auto Scaling Group capacity has dropped below minimum threshold

KeyPairName.Description: EC2 Key Pair Name (if created automatically)

DataBucketName.Description: Primary S3 Bucket Name used by the application
